name: 阿尔芒·斐索
bio_short: 法国物理学家。他是历史上第一个在地球表面（非天文观测）精确测量光速的人（`fizeau_speed_of_light_1849`）。他还将多普勒效应推广到了光波（红移）。
bio_short_en: A French physicist. He was the first person in history to measure the speed of light terrestrially (non-astronomically) (`fizeau_speed_of_light_1849`). He also extended the Doppler effect to light waves (redshift).
